column1: Nazaré da Mata is a city located in the state of Pernambuco
column2: Brazil. Located  at 62 km from Recife
column3: capital of the state of Pernambuco. Has an estimated (Ibge 2009) population of 30
column5: it is well known as the town of Maracatu Rural  and its engenhos de cana-de-açúcar (sugarcane plantations houses). It is the seat of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Nazaré.

column2: Condado and Itaquitinga   (N);  Tracunhaém   (S and E);  Carpina and Buenos Aires  (W); Vitória de Santo Antão   (E)

column1: The main economic activities in Nazaré da Mata are based in food and beverage industry
column3: especially sugarcane; and livestock such as poultry
